newsItems.title: New Research Sheds Light on OCD and Anxiety Link
newsItems.summary: Studies have shown a strong association between obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) and anxiety, suggesting potential new treatments targeting both conditions.

newsItems.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy: An Effective Treatment for OCD
newsItems.summary: Experts highlight Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) as one of the most effective treatments for managing OCD symptoms, offering long-term relief for patients.

newsItems.title: Exploring the Genetic Basis of OCD
newsItems.summary: Recent research delves into the genetic factors that may contribute to the development of OCD, providing insights into future treatments.
